function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Complex sociotechnical processes of decarbonisation within energy systems","Impact":"Slow progress in transitioning to low or zero carbon energy, leading to continued reliance on high carbon energy sources","Mitigation":"Implementation of policies and incentives to accelerate the adoption of low or zero carbon energy sources","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, energy storage solutions","People":"Communities reliant on high carbon energy sources","Owner":"Government, energy regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Inequity and energy poverty","Impact":"Disproportionate access to sustainable energy solutions, perpetuating energy poverty and social inequity","Mitigation":"Targeted policies and programs to ensure access to sustainable energy solutions for marginalized communities","Technologies":"Community-based renewable energy projects, energy efficiency technologies","People":"Marginalized communities, low-income households","Owner":"Government, non-profit organizations"},{"Description":"Political approaches to sustainability","Impact":"Divergent pace, scale, and technologies in sustainable energy transitions due to differing political approaches","Mitigation":"International collaboration and standardization of sustainable energy policies and regulations","Technologies":"Global energy governance platforms, international renewable energy agreements","People":"National and global political leaders, energy policy makers","Owner":"International organizations, global governance bodies"}]}
